name: TestingCzars
tag_list: automated-testing, software-testing, software-qa, software-quality-assurance, quality-assurance, qa, script-free-automation, script-free
description: We build testing technology and provide
overview:
TestingCzars build testing technology and provide testing services so companies can quickly and economically move beyond slow manual testing and on to strategic quality control.

Since 2005, TestingCzars has provided software testing services and licensed testing technology to companies of all sizes, ranging from small software companies to Fortune 1000 companies like Yahoo. Its services and products help automate tedious manual testing so software development teams can improve quality even while increasing the frequency of their builds and releases.

TestingCzars has its own automated testing tool, Verifaya, which provides up to 20X improved productivity compared to other test automation alternatives. It allows test engineers and product managers of all levels of experience to contribute to the automation effort.

Their services team is 100% focused on test projects and has expertise in testing web, mobile, and client/server applications.

milestones.description: Intel Capital, the venture capital (VC) arm of the world's largest chip maker announced the completion of investment in TestingCzars, of its $20 million investment in 6 tech companies.
milestones.source_description: Intel Capital announces completion of its investment in TestingCzars

milestones.description: TestingCzars has exciting ambitions for its global growth and we are re-branding our flagship product AutoCzar to Verifaya. This name change reflects our greater achievements in global market and announces the addition of mobile application testing suppor
milestones.source_description: AutoCzar, the flagship test automation tool by TestingCzars is now Verifaya
